div.p:
Welcome to Cowan Community Schools! Cowan is located a few short miles south of Muncie, Indiana. Cowan School Corporation is made up of Monroe Township in Delaware County. The enrollment is approximately 820 students in grades K-12.
Last year, Cowan Community Schools, Cowan Elementary School, and Cowan Jr./Sr. High School all received a B Rating from the Indiana Department of Education.
Cowan is a member of the Muncie Area Career Center and the Delaware-Blackford Special Education Cooperative.
Indiana has a Dashboard for Political Subdivisions to see Local Tax and Financial data. To see this Dashboard for Cowan or other Political Subdivisions, please click HERE.
Please look through our website and let us know if you still have questions.
